CHAT.comment: PHARMACEUTICAL RESEARCH AND MANUFACTURERS OF AMERICA Petitioner v. KEVIN CONCANNON, COMMISSIONER, MAINE DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW S. HAGLER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:07 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
